CustomField.description: For Dynamic UI, the recommended image size is 2500 x 731px, with a minimum of 1100 x 321px. For all other UIs, the recommended image size is 820 x 410, with a minimum of 650 x 320px.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The URL for the background image of the Event. At least 650 by 320. The image width to height ratio is roughly 2:1. Recommended Size = 820px x 410px.
CustomField.label: Image URL
